div.h2:
Welcome to Brodhead School District
Learning Today for a Better Tomorrow

p.span:
Our Mission
To provide all students with quality education; enthusiastically delivered.
Our Vision:
The purpose of the School District of Brodhead is to provide a comprehensive curriculum of core subjects and electives useful for the college bound, vocational bound, or work bound student.
